description:
Muse Dash is a rhythm game where you hit objects to the beat of one of 400+ songs.
Play through a selection of randomly chosen songs, collecting music sheets
until you have enough to play and complete the goal song!

v1.5.10.description:
# Changes
- Fixes issues related to having the wrong item ids for the new Blue Archive and Arknights Collabs

# Installation
### Melonloader
*Melonloader is required to play with this mod.  However reinstalling it is not required on update.*

1. Download MelonLoader.Installer.exe from https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader/releases/latest and run it.
2. Choose the automated tab, click the select button and browse to `MuseDash.exe`.
    - You can find the folder in steam by finding the game in your library, right clicking it and choosing *Manage→Browse Local Files*.
    - If you click the bar at the top telling you your current folder, this will give you a path you can copy. If you paste that into the window popped up by **MelonLoader**, it will automatically go to the same folder.
3. The launcher will automatically default to the latest version. 
    - If the latest version is not working: **Untick Latest and select 0.6.1.**
4. Click install. Once finished run the game once.

### Mod Install

1.Download `ArchipelagoMuseDash.zip`.
2. Head to the Muse Dash folder and open up `/mods/`.
3. Extract the contents of the .zip file into mods.
   - Ensure that `ArchipelagoMuseDash.dll` and `Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.dll` are under `/mods/` and not within a sub folder.
4. Run the game. If a new button appears on the start screen the mod was installed correctly.
v1.5.10.title: v1.5.10

v1.5.16.description:
# Changes
- Updated to the Rotaeno collab.
- You can now disconnect from your current archipelago session and connect to another.
  - You can do this by heading back to the menu.
  - You will stay need to restart the game to play vanilla however.

# Installation
### Melonloader
*Melonloader is required to play with this mod.  However reinstalling it is not required on update.*

v1.5.20.description:
# Changes
- Improved compatibility with Melonloader v0.7.1
  - Please note that there may be more issues with v0.7.1. If you run into issues please downgrade to v0.7.0 or v0.6.6
- Newtonsoft.Json.dll is now included. This may resolve some rare issues.

# Installation
### Melonloader
*Melonloader is required to play with this mod.  However reinstalling it is not required on update.*

1. Download MelonLoader.Installer.exe from https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader/releases/latest and run it.

4. Run the game. If a new button appears on the start screen the mod was installed correctly.

v1.5.22.description:
# Changes
- On Entering Song Select, name search queries will be set to empty.
  - Some issues will still appear if you had a search query, such as ordering of the song select.
  - This is a temporary fix as a more proper fix will be investigated.

### Melonloader

### Mod Install

1.Download `ArchipelagoMuseDash.zip`.
2. Head to the Muse Dash folder and open up `/mods/`.
3. Extract the contents of the .zip file into mods.
   - Ensure that `ArchipelagoMuseDash.dll` and `Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.dll` are under `/mods/` and not within a sub folder.
4. Run the game. If a new button appears on the start screen the mod was installed correctly.
v1.5.28r2.title: v1.5.28

v1.5.29.description:
# Changes
- Adds support for Cosmic Radio 2025 and extra songs.
- Possibly fixes issue where song can go missing when swapping visibility modes.

# Installation
### Melonloader
*Melonloader is required to play with this mod.  However reinstalling it is not required on update.*

1. Download MelonLoader.Installer.exe from https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader/releases/latest and run it.
2. Choose the automated tab, click the select button and browse to `MuseDash.exe`.
    - You can find the folder in steam by finding the game in your library, right clicking it and choosing *Manage→Browse Local Files*.
    - If you click the bar at the top telling you your current folder, this will give you a path you can copy. If you paste that into the window popped up by **MelonLoader**, it will automatically go to the same folder.
3. The launcher will automatically default to the latest version. 
    - If the latest version is not working: **Untick Latest and select 0.6.6.**
4. Click install. Once finished run the game once.

### Mod Install

1.Download `ArchipelagoMuseDash.zip`.
2. Head to the Muse Dash folder and open up `/mods/`.
3. Extract the contents of the .zip file into mods.
   - Ensure that `ArchipelagoMuseDash.dll` and `Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.dll` are under `/mods/` and not within a sub folder.
4. Run the game. If a new button appears on the start screen the mod was installed correctly.
v1.5.29.title: v1.5.29

v1.5.9.description:
# Changes
- Updated to Muse Dash v4.12.0 (MSR Anthology_Vol.02)

# Installation
### Melonloader
*Melonloader is required to play with this mod.  However reinstalling it is not required on update.*

1. Download MelonLoader.Installer.exe from https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader/releases/latest and run it.
2. Choose the automated tab, click the select button and browse to `MuseDash.exe`.
    - You can find the folder in steam by finding the game in your library, right clicking it and choosing *Manage→Browse Local Files*.
    - If you click the bar at the top telling you your current folder, this will give you a path you can copy. If you paste that into the window popped up by **MelonLoader**, it will automatically go to the same folder.
3. The launcher will automatically default to the latest version. 
    - If the latest version is not working: **Untick Latest and select 0.6.1.**
4. Click install. Once finished run the game once.

### Mod Install

1.Download `ArchipelagoMuseDash.zip`.
2. Head to the Muse Dash folder and open up `/mods/`.
3. Extract the contents of the .zip file into mods.
   - Ensure that `ArchipelagoMuseDash.dll` and `Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.dll` are under `/mods/` and not within a sub folder.
4. Run the game. If a new button appears on the start screen the mod was installed correctly.
v1.5.9.title: v1.5.9
